name: Key Lime Mojitos
label: Rum
instructions: Place crackers on a plate. Pour simple syrup onto another plate. Dip rims of 2 glasses into simple syrup, then into crackers.
In a cocktail shaker, muddle mint and lime juice. Fill shaker with ice and add rum, cream, and 3 tablespoons simple syrup. Vigorously shake until outside of shaker is very frosty, about 20 seconds.
Fill glasses with ice and strain mojito into prepared glasses. Garnish with more mint and a Key lime round.
